```lisp
[
  (:action turn ; Transform an item into another state or type
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?tool - tool ?new_type - type ?condition - condition ?new_condition - condition)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (has ?p ?tool) (condition ?item ?condition))
    :effect (and (not (condition ?item ?condition)) (condition ?item ?new_condition) (type ?item ?new_type))
  )

  (:action use ; Use an item and transform its type
    :parameters (?p - player ?item - object ?tool - tool ?old_type - type ?new_type - type)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (has ?p ?tool) (type ?item ?old_type))
    :effect (and (not (type ?item ?old_type)) (type ?item ?new_type))
  )

  (:action use
    :parameters (?p - player ?up - underpants ?sc - scissors)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?up) (has ?p ?sc) (type ?up underpants))
    :effect (and (not (type ?up underpants)) (type ?up cut_underpants))
  )

  (:action use
    :parameters (?p - player ?up - underpants)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?up) (type ?up old_underwear))
    :effect (and (not (type ?up old_underwear)) (type ?up new_underwear))
  )

  (:action wear_as_superhero_costume
    :parameters (?c - child ?up - underpants)
    :precondition (and (at ?c ?up) (type ?up old_underwear))
    :effect (and (wearing ?c ?up) (playing_superhero ?c))
  )

  (:action wear ; General action for wearing an item
    :parameters (?actor - person ?item - object ?role - activity)
    :precondition (and (at ?actor ?item) (type ?item wearable))
    :effect (and (wearing ?actor ?item) (performing ?actor ?role))
  )

  (:action donate ; Donate an item and update the status
    :parameters (?p - person ?item - object)
    :precondition (and (at ?p ?item) (type ?item object))
    :effect (and (not (has ?p ?item)) (donated ?item))
  )
]
```
